newsitem.title: USA: U.S. cash soymeal - Basis steady-down, trade slow.
newsitem.headline: U.S. cash soymeal - Basis steady-down, trade slow.

text.p: Soybean basis offers were steady to modestly lower Monday in slow holiday-type trading, cash dealers said.
"There's absolutely nothing going on," said one southern broker. "Basically, we're in a pre-Christmas slump."
Most buyers have already covered their needs ahead of the Christmas holiday on Wednesday, but dealers reported light buying from end-users covering needs for next week.
"Business is light, it should be light," a broker said.
A northern Midwest broker also reported that some processors were oversold and were shipping soymeal.
Spot rail soymeal (dollars/ton basis CBOT, 47.5 pct protein):
